attributes.action: Turn the United Kingdom into a federal state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Turning the Unitd Kingdom into a federal state will allow for there to be an equality between the nations in the governing of the four nations of the kingdom. This will preserving the integraty of the union, and also while allowing the nations a degree a self rule.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
